nav.bio: I am Sineu Nouleughe Reins Keny, a 3rd year Software Engineering Bachelor student at Keyce Informatique. Passionate about web and mobile development, I design modern and high-performance applications with Angular, TypeScript, Symfony and Firebase. Curious and rigorous, I like to combine technology, design and software architecture to create useful and sustainable solutions. My ambition: to become a software architect and contribute to innovative projects with high impact.
